description: Dual paths of freezing control (Glacier) and shattering offense (Avalanche).

abilities.name: Ice Veil
abilities.effect: +2 to resist attacks for 1 round.

abilities.name: Frost Armor
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, coat your armor in frost. The next time you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d6 cold damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Ground
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, freeze the 5-foot square you are standing on. It is difficult terrain for enemies, and you gain +2 to resist being moved.

abilities.name: Permafrost
abilities.effect: Gain resistance to cold damage for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.effect: Touch a creature. They must make a Might DC 12 check or have their movement speed halved for their next turn. This costs 1 Resolve.

abilities.name: Icy Wall
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot long, 5-foot high wall of ice. It provides cover and has 20 Vitality.

abilities.name: Hoarfrost
abilities.effect: Cover a 15-foot square in slick ice. It is difficult terrain, and creatures entering must make an Agility DC 12 check or fall prone.

abilities.name: Rime Veil
abilities.effect: Enhances Ice Veil. While Ice Veil is active, you also gain resistance to Fire damage.

abilities.name: Blizzard Step
abilities.effect: You can teleport up to 30 feet in a puff of cold vapor, leaving a trail of ice behind you that causes enemies to make a Dexterity check to avoid slipping. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Winter's Embrace
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can grant an ally temporary Vitality equal to your Spirit attribute. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Earthen Grasp
abilities.effect: Attempt to 'Restrain' a target for 1 round.

abilities.name: Glacial Wall
abilities.effect: Raise a 5-foot-high, 15-foot-long wall of solid ice. The wall provides cover and has 20 Vitality.

abilities.name: Frozen Prison
abilities.effect: Encase a single target in ice. The target must make a Might DC 14 check or become 'Incapacitated' for up to 3 rounds, re-attempting the check each turn.

abilities.name: Iceberg
abilities.effect: You conjure a massive block of ice that drops onto a 10-foot square, dealing 3d10 cold damage to all creatures in the area and creating a solid obstacle. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Enduring Cold
abilities.effect: As a reaction when an ally takes cold damage, you can use this ability to grant them immunity to that damage type for the rest of the round. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.effect: Drastically lower the temperature in a 30-foot radius. Enemies have their movement speed reduced to 0 and have disadvantage on Agility checks for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: Glacial Aura
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot aura around you. Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura takes 2d8 cold damage and has their movement speed halved for that turn. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Frigid Touch
abilities.effect: Enhances Frost Armor. The cold damage dealt by Frost Armor is increased to 2d8.

abilities.name: Glacial Tomb
abilities.effect: Entomb one creature in impenetrable ice for up to 1 minute. The creature is 'Incapacitated' and cannot be targeted or damaged. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Endless Winter
abilities.effect: You bring a small, localized blizzard to the battlefield for 1 minute. The area within a 60-foot radius of you is heavily obscured. At the start of each of your turns, all enemies in the area take 4d10 cold damage, and their movement is reduced to 0 for the turn. This costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Frost Lance
abilities.effect: Hurl a lance of ice dealing 1d10 cold damage and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.effect: Hurl a shard of magical ice, dealing 1d8 cold damage. This ability has a lower DC.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.effect: Touch a creature. They must make a Might DC 12 check or have their movement speed halved for their next turn.

abilities.name: Frozen Ground
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, freeze the 5-foot square you are standing on. It is difficult terrain for enemies.

abilities.name: Ice Shard Volley
abilities.effect: Fire a volley of three ice shards at a single target or up to three different targets. Each shard deals 1d6 cold damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Heart
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after hitting a target with a cold-based attack, the target takes a -1 penalty on their next roll.

abilities.name: Shatter
abilities.effect: Target a frozen or slowed enemy, dealing 2d6 physical damage and ending the effect.

abilities.name: Hailstones
abilities.effect: Pelt a 15-foot radius area with magical hailstones, dealing 2d8 cold damage to all creatures.

abilities.name: Icicle Storm
abilities.effect: Create a 20-foot cone of falling icicles. All enemies in the area take 2d6 piercing damage and must make a Mind DC 13 check or be 'Frightened' for 1 round. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Frozen Aura
abilities.effect: Create a 10-foot aura of intense cold around you. Any creature that ends its turn within the aura must make a Might DC 13 check or their movement speed is halved for their next turn. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Flash Freeze
abilities.effect: You can now Shatter a non-slowed target, but the ability's damage is reduced to 1d8.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.effect: Enhances Shatter. When you use Shatter to defeat an enemy, creatures adjacent to the target take half of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Glacial Spike
abilities.effect: Launch a massive spike of ice at a single target. The attack deals 3d12 piercing damage. On a successful hit, the target is pushed back 15 feet. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.effect: You summon a 20-foot long, 10-foot high wall of solid ice. It is difficult terrain to cross and has 40 Vitality. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Freezing Wave
abilities.effect: You send out a wave of cold in a 30-foot cone. All enemies in the area take 2d8 cold damage and have their movement speed reduced to 0 for one round. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.effect: Create a 25-foot radius storm of ice and snow for 3 rounds. The area is heavily obscured. Deals 3d10 initial cold damage, then 2d10 cold damage to enemies who start their turn inside.

abilities.name: Permafrost Trap
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can designate a 15-foot square as a trap. The first enemy to enter the square must make an Agility DC 16 check or be completely frozen, becoming 'Incapacitated' for 1 round. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Unending Avalanche
abilities.effect: When you use your Avalanche ability to defeat a creature, you can immediately cast it again on another creature within 30 feet, without spending additional resolve.

abilities.name: Comet
abilities.effect: Summon a comet of ice to crash down, dealing 6d12 cold damage to all creatures in a 20-foot radius. The area becomes difficult terrain. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Cryogenic Tomb
abilities.effect: You can attempt to entomb a single creature in ice. They must make a Might DC 18 check. On a failure, they are encased in a solid block of ice and are completely removed from combat for 1 minute. The effect ends if they take 100 damage from a single attack. This costs 20 Resolve.
